Name: Bermuda Rose
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of apricot slice on rim.
Review: Delicate, floral, and aromatic, it has a hint of sweetness but not to offend. Despite the lack of juice in this recipe, don't be tempted to stir rather than shake; this is classically a shaken cocktail, and it's all the better for it. At its best, drink whilst still cloudy from shaking.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron 's 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide (Revised Edition) .
Nutrition: One serving of Bermuda Rose contains 188 calories
